alert.note: Alert for Coweta; Meriwether; Troup (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 21 at 2:59PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Meriwether, northeastern Troup and south central Coweta Counties through 330 PM EST ... At 259 PM EST, a strong thunderstorm was near Harrisonville, or 7 miles northeast of LaGrange, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... LaGrange, Hogansville, Grantville, Luthersville, Lone Oak, Rocky Mount, Saint Marks, Harrisonville, Hillcrest, and Louise. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
